title: Minecraft之歌：Minecraft Everyday
author: 素履信游
txt_content:
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XMjEwODc0MDE2/v.swf
歌词：
everybody is walking round mine town
mining coal and iron, gold and what can be found.
soon or later creepers come my way
i'll never find that diamond anyway so
my tools keep on breaking away
I got minecraft, log in everyday.
hey hey hey.

everybody keeps fallin' into lava
I blame the cows and pigs they push me cause they wanna.
soon or later spiders come my way.
i'll never find that diamond anyway. so
my tools keep on breaking away.
I got minecraft, log in everyday.

hey hey hey

(guitar solo)

my tools can't be found
cause I died and
there's a creeper bound, creeper bound

my tools keep on breaking away.
I got minecraft, log in everyday.
my tools keep on breaking away.
I got minecraft, log in everyday.

replies.author: ghostboyz
replies.txt_content: 打算校庆跟同学一起唱的=__= 没了纯音乐T____T
